title: Distinct Substrings
text:
Given a string, we need to find the total number of its distinct substrings.InputT- number of test cases. T ≤ 20;Each test case consists of one string, whose length is  ≤ 1000OutputFor each test case output one number saying the number of distinct substrings.ExampleInput:2
CCCCC
ABABAOutput:5
9Explanation for the testcase with string ABABA:len=1 : A, Blen=2 : AB, BAlen=3 : ABA, BABlen=4 : ABAB, BABAlen=5 : ABABAThus, total number of distinct substrings is 9.
